descriptionHtml:
Added a adult tropical island and custom animations which is made by me for female and male PC. Female PC enjoy with naked NPC. Male PC enjoy with followers.

Required :
- DLC Dragonborn
- DLC Hearthfire
- SKSE v1.07.03
- FNIS v6.3
- Mfg Console
- XPMS or XPMSE
- Microsoft Visual C++ 2012 Redistributable (x86)
- OSA(Sound files)

Recommend :
- HDT Physics Extensions
- HDT vagina collision body
- SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim

Install :
1. install this mod files
2. Run FNIS.exe
*If you repeat uninstallation and installation, mod's work will make odd behavior

How to use :
=== From Windhelm ====
1. Talk to Gjalund Salt-Sage(Windhelm port)
=== From Solitude lighthouse bridge ====
1. First, You need to buy a oar from Mazaka(in the lighthouse). Next, activate boat near the lighthouse. If you don't have a(some) oar(s), nothing happens. When you activate it, A oar will be consumed.
===============================
2. Talk to Inn master in the tropical island(about naked people)
3. You will be able to use the adult feature
4. Talk to naked male NPC or activate activator with following him
5. Enjoy that!
6. Activate boat in the island if you'd like to return to Skyrim
NOTE 1 : Don't thief and murder in the island. Don't commit crimes on the peaceful island [s]because I don't set crime faction[/s].
NOTE 2 : Don't use teleport and coc. The Mod quest doesn't work correctly.
NOTE 3 : If does not work "change my mind", talk to inn master about "back to the Skyrim". Or actual back to Skyrim once without saying anything. Sometimes, it seems to not work correctly. If selected "Back to the Skyrim", hided "naked NPC dialogue". You need to pay money to Gjalund or Mazaka again.
NOTE 4 : If you don't move to the island even if talk to Gjalund, use a Solitude Mazaka's boat.

Key control :
"NUM8" speed up, "NUM2" speed down, "NUM4" Previous animation, "NUM6" next animation, "NUM0" return neutral animation,
"NUM." fnish, "NUM enter" OK.
You can set unequip items and HDT collision and key bind setting by editing SKSE/Plugins/TropicalIsland.ini.

Credit :
I will not be able to have done without you.
